backend.database

Class ImageDAOManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.database.ImageDAOManager

  • public class ImageDAOManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages images, and directly interacts with the SQL database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageDAOManager(javax.persistence.EntityManagerFactory emf)
      Instantiates a new ImageDAO Manager.

    • Method Detail

      • newUser

        boolean newUser(java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.String password)
        Registers a new user
        Parameters:
        username - the username, cannot already be in the database, not case-sensitive
        password - the password being registered
        Returns:
        true if registration was successful, false if username is taken, or if a non-ascii character has been entered

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password)
        Attempts to login with the given username or password
        Parameters:
        username - username to the user you want to log in as, not case-sensetive
        password - password to this user, case-sensetive
        Returns:
        false if username was not found or password is incorrect, true is password is correct for the given user

      • addImageToTable

        void addImageToTable(java.lang.String path,
                     int fileSize,
                     int date,
                     int imageHeight,
                     int imageWidth,
                     double gpsLatitude,
                     double gpsLongitude)
        Create new images and adds them to the database. Persist works as SQL INSERT. The image path needs to be unique for a given user.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        fileSize - the file size
        date - the date
        imageHeight - the image height
        imageWidth - the image width
        gpsLatitude - the gps latitude
        gpsLongitude - the gps longitude

              java.util.List<java.lang.String> paths)
        Adds an album to the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the album
        paths - a List with the paths to images in album

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getAlbumMap()
